full_summary:
# Site Operations Pickle Lake Automated Radiosonde Observing System

**Solicitation Number:** 5000075621R
**Notice Date:** 2023-11-28

**Request for Proposal:** Environment and Climate Change Canada invites contractors to provide service and maintenance for the Vaisala Automated Radiosonde Observing System located in Pickle Lake, Ontario.

**Duration and Period:** The contract is valid for two years, from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2026.

**Evaluation Criteria:** The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit (70%) and price (30%).

**Security Requirements:**aptors must meet certain security requirements. Refer to Part 6 – Security and Other Requirements of the solicitation for more information.

**Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to Canada's trade agreements with Korea, Chile, Colombia, Honduras, Peru, Panama, and under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Social Procurement:** Environment and Climate Change Canada encourages bidders from under-represented groups to participate.

**GBR:** 81151502, Meteorological Services
**GSIN:** R102
**NIP:** 97089

**Contracting Entity:** Environment and Climate Change Canada
**Address:** 867 Lakeshore Road, Burlington, ON L7S1A1
**Contact:** Caitlin Andersen, Email: [caitlin.andersen@ec.gc.ca](mailto:caitlin.andersen@ec.gc.ca), Phone: (289) 812-9507

**Tender Documents:**

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26076/5000075621rfp_en_repostfinal.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26076/5000075621rfp_fr_repostfinal.pdf>

**Note:** Due to the changes in formatting, eg. shortened vendor information and link replacements, we may need to necessitate edit revisions.


Now you should have a more polished and easier to read text. Just remember to proofread carefully for any typos and any inferences throughout your output. This input was mainly relevant for contracts and tender announcements - any errors could be costly.
